overview:
Thomas is founder and CEO of WHOS.IN, a #local #social #mobile #photosharing startup, founded July 2011.

Thomas studied business & information systems in Saarbruecken (Germany) and is internationally known for a couple of projects for the OpenID community (OpenIDDirectory.com, SpreadOpenID.org), but also for his innovative approach to lifestreaming in 2008 (lifestrea.ms).

Thomas has a long track record as a tech entrepreneur with 15+ years experience in running internet businesses based on cutting edge technology, e.g.

  • WM-Special.de and EM-Special.de Special event sites for the soccer world championship and the soccer european championship

  • Formel1-Team.de Formula One news magazine

  • cheap4you.com One of the first group buying concepts in 1999, self funded.

  • bundesligareport.de Soccer news magazine with high quality content

  • carorder.de Car news magazine with high quality content

  • Fussballfreunde24.de Germanys first social network for soccer fans (2005)

  • Strominfos.de Tariff comparison for electricity providers (sold to Verivox)

  • infopopup.de Innovative advertising format with fully automatic text analysis and creation of “on-hover popups” offering paid search results

  • Hotwin24.de Automated registration service for online contests

  • Helpnet24.org Germanys first social network for causes

  • Handykosten24.de Tariff comparison for mobile providers

  • Messe-Network.de Planning and online-meeting tool, accompanying real world events with online business networking

Thomas is married and has 2 children.
